MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch, affecting properties in Hillhead Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 00:03AM. Our engineers have arrived on site at Shells substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:15AM on 27 October 2020.
